languages.text: "Если бы нам дали провести проверку местного населения, ничего этого не случилось бы".
"None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."
languages.original_text: "Если бы нам дали провести проверку местного населения, ничего этого не случилось бы".

traits.locale_text: "None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."
"None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."
"None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."
"None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."
"None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."
"None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."

languages.text: "Das wäre alles nicht passiert, wenn wir die Einheimischen hätten überprüfen dürfen."
languages.original_text: "None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre alles nicht passiert, wenn wir die Einheimischen hätten überprüfen dürfen."

languages.text: « Rien de ceci ne se serait produit si nous avions pu enquêter sur les locaux. »
languages.original_text: "None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."

traits.locale_text: « Rien de ceci ne se serait produit si nous avions pu enquêter sur les locaux. »

languages.text: 「もし現地の人々を調査させてもらえていたら、こんなことは一切起こらなかっただろうに」
languages.original_text: "None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."

traits.locale_text: 「もし現地の人々を調査させてもらえていたら、こんなことは一切起こらなかっただろうに」

languages.text: «Nada de esto habría sucedido si se nos hubiera permitido investigar a los nativos».
languages.original_text: "None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."

traits.locale_text: «Nada de esto habría sucedido si se nos hubiera permitido investigar a los nativos».

languages.text: “要是当初元帅允许我们调查当地人，那这场动乱从一开始就不会发生。”
languages.original_text: "None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."

traits.locale_text: “要是当初元帅允许我们调查当地人，那这场动乱从一开始就不会发生。”

languages.text: "Yerlileri sorgulamamıza müsaade edilse bunların hiçbiri yaşanmazdı."
languages.original_text: "None of this would have happened had we been allowed to investigate the locals."

traits.locale_text: "Yerlileri sorgulamamıza müsaade edilse bunların hiçbiri yaşanmazdı."
